main event: An observer reported seeing a bright light moving slowly across the horizon at Big Sur Hot Springs, California.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a softball.,The observer estimated the object's speed to be around 60 mph.,The observation lasted for 4-5 minutes.,The light's motion did not appear to be consistent with a small plane.,No physical evidence or photographs were associated with the sighting.
location: Big Sur Hot Springs, California, USA
witness description: the observer saw a bright light resembling a small light on a small plane
